author: ggovi
body:
In this PR:
1. clean up of various hacks for conddb tools, no longer required in sqllachemy 1.1.4
2. o2oMgr tool with various new functionalities:
  - job configuration (JSON) replace the Tag information
  - command to change interval and configuration
  - command to list jobs and configuration
  - job execution gets the input params from the JSON configuration
title: Improvements for o2o tools
